definition: be engaged by a written agreement
opposite_reasoning: Disagreement is the strongest and most natural antonym for Agreement. It provides clear binary opposition: Agreement represents mutual consent and aligned understanding, while Disagreement represents lack of consensus and conflicting positions. This opposition is well-established in natural language, exists in both WordNet and SUMO, and provides excellent steering utility for AI safety applications. For alignment monitoring, the Agreement↔Disagreement axis can help detect when an AI system is representing consensus vs. conflict, or honoring commitments vs. breaking them. The opposition is semantically clean, maximizing Fisher-LDA separation.
